author: costin
msg: Added few more checks for security.
Add the class path to the taskdefs, so it can be run standalone.

author: costin
msg: Make sure the context class loader is set ( if 1.2 available )

author: costin
msg: Use the class loader set by the user when creating objects.

author: costin
msg: Added the missing methods ( resetCache and addHook )

author: costin
msg: This is another big security addition - we already had huge problems with that.
Note that this fix is done at the lowest level - the mapper - instead of
requiring each individual servlet/module to do many checks.
It is of course easy to turn this off or on.
